article_title: California’s health exchange bent own rules in awarding big contracts
article_text:
Audit found little justification for lapses at Obamacare agency

$134 million sole-source contract ran afoul of rules

Covered California says its policies have improved

article_metadata.description: A new audit slams Covered California, the agency tasked with enrolling state residents in Obamacare, for not following rules when awarding lucrative contracts without a competitive-bidding process.
article_metadata.title: California’s health exchange bent own rules in awarding big contracts | The Sacramento Bee
